alias_create_new_subhead: Please enter your new Name & Tagline.
alias_create_change_subhead:
Sorry, but we need you to choose a new Name & Tagline. Your last ones are unavailable likely due to inactivity or too many reports.

Check the fine print on what’s cool for names and be sure to let us know if you believe this was an error.
alias_create_change_subhead_no_tag:
Sorry, but we need you to choose a new name. Your last one is unavailable likely due to inactivity or too many reports.

Check the fine print on what’s cool for names and be sure to let us know if you believe this was an error.
alias_create_game_name_length: Player Name must be between 3 and 16 characters
alias_create_tag_line_length: Tagline must be between 3 and 5 characters
alias_create_name_unavailable: Name currently unavailable. Enter a new name and try again.
alias_create_rate_limited: You've made too many requests in a short time. Please try again later.
alias_create_server_error: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
patching_experience_body: Please wait for the game to finish installing before playing
summoner_create_name_subheader: What name will you go by in the game?
summoner_create_name_forced_note_one: Sorry, but we need you to choose a new summoner name. Your last one is unavailable likely due to inactivity or too many reports.
summoner_create_name_forced_note_two: {{name_faq_link}} on what’s cool for summoner names and be sure to let us know if you believe this was an error.
summoner_create_name_error_character_len: Summoner name needs to be between 3 and 16 characters.
summoner_create_name_request_error: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
summoner_create_name_request_error_name_: Name currently unavailable. Enter a new name and try again.
npe_guidance_subtitle: Before we get you in game, what are you here to play? Don't worry, you'll still be able to play any mode regardless of what you choose.
npe_guidance_card1_body: Crush your lane, dive into epic five-on-five team fights, and destroy the enemy nexus in League's premier competitive mode.
npe_guidance_card2_body: Assemble a squad of champions that battle on your behalf. Outlast all seven of your opponents and become the last person standing.
